data.title: Balia, Barisal, BD Climate Zone, Monthly Averages, Historical Weather Data
data.meta_description: Located at an elevation of 2.49 meters (8.17 feet) above sea level, Balia has a Tropical wet and dry or savanna climate (Classification: Aw).
data.text:
Balia Climate Summary

Located at an elevation of 2.49 meters (8.17 feet) above sea level, Balia has a Tropical wet and dry or savanna climate (Classification: Aw). The district’s yearly temperature is 30.14ºC (86.25ºF) and it is 2.4% higher than Bangladesh’s averages. Balia typically receives about 49.15 millimeters (1.94 inches) of precipitation and has 100.07 rainy days (27.42% of the time) annually.
